EmailTemplate.name: VMworld 2015 VIP Cocktail Party.Maybe Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: We Hope You'll Join Us: VMTurbo VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We hope we'll see you at the reception on Monday, August 31st after a long day at VMworld.
When your schedule is set, feel free to revisit the invitation page and confirm your registration <http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/vmworld-2015-vip-cocktail-party?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vipinvite&utm_content=confirmationemail>. We'll send you a reminder a few days before.
Even if you can't make the reception (we hope you will), make sure to stop by booth #505 and see what the future of the data center looks like. - The VMTurbo Team
